snippet: The ratings service slashed its rating on the utility’s revenue bonds by four notches to B- from BB.
abstract: Standard & Poor's Ratings Services slashes its rating on the Puerto Rico Electric Power Authority's revenue bonds by four notches to B- from BB, citing agency's inability so far to negotiate renewal of line of credit from Citibank and the threat of potential debt restructuring.
lead_paragraph: The ratings service slashed its rating on the utility’s revenue bonds by four notches to B- from BB.

headline.main: Standard & Poor’s Cuts Rating for Puerto Rico Electric Power
headline.print_headline: Standard & Poor’s Cuts Rating for Puerto Rico Electric Power
